required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sintilimab (IBI308) in Refractory or Relapsed PMBCL, PT/NKCL and PCNSL
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Sintilimab (IBI308) in the Refractory or Relapsed PMBCL, PT/NKCL and PCNSL: A Phase 2, Single-center, Single-arm, Open Label Trial

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm, single-center Phase II clinical trial for patients with relapsed or refractory primary mediastinal large B-cell lymphoma (PMBCL), Peripheral T/NK-cell lymphoma (PT/NKCL), Primary central nervous system lymphoma (PCNSL). Although safety and efficacy of PD-1 antibodies (Pembrolizumab or Nivolumab) in these patients were confirmed, anti-tumor effects of Sintilimab (IBI308) in these patients are still unknown. Therefore, the trial is conducted to study the safety and efficacy of Sintilimab in patients with relapsed or refractory PMBCL, PT/NKCL or PCNSL.

detailed_description.textblock:
PRIMARY OBJECTIVES:
1) To determine the objective response rate (ORR) .
SECONDARY OBJECTIVES:
1. To determine the complete response (CR) rate and partial response (PR) rate.
2. To determine the time to response (TTR).
3. To determine the duration of response (DOR).
4. To determine the progression free survival (PFS).
5. To determine the overall survival (OS).
6. To determine the safety.
EXPLORATORY OBJECTIVES:
1) To correlate PD-L1/L2 gene alterations and PD-L1/L2 protein expressions of tumor and the efficacy of Sinitilimab.

primary_outcome.description: Complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) by Lugano 2014 response criteria

secondary_outcome.description: The time to response is defined as time from the date of first dose to the date of the first confirmed objective response
DOR is defined as the time from the date of first remission to the date of disease progression or death whichever is earlier
PFS is defined as the time from the treatment date to the date of disease progression per the Lugano 2014 Response Criteria or death regardless of cause
OS is defined as the time from treatment to the date of death

other_outcome.description: To correlate PD-L1/L2 gene alterations and PD-L1/L2 protein expressions of tumor and the efficacy of Sinitilimab
